info.title: About the Organization
info.description: We are the veteran organization Fortis Unitas, offering free weekly SUP training sessions on the Desenka River for veterans and active military personnel With the support of SUP Kayak Club '4 Storony', we’ve created a space for rehabilitation, recovery, and community Regardless of your physical shape — you’re welcome We train all year round, share coffee after the water, and support each other both on the board and in life

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.intro: We are Fortis Unitas, a veteran charity organization that brings together people ready to support each other and find strength for a new beginning after service. We are a team of people who believe in the importance of rehabilitation, support, and unity to return to normal life after hardships. And we do this together!
aboutUs.howItBeganDescription: In 2024, our team launched a project offering free SUP training in Kyiv on Desenka for veterans and active military personnel. Today, it's not just a sport, but a true form of psycho-social rehabilitation, where every participant feels support and care.
aboutUs.whatWeDoDescription1: Every Saturday we offer free SUP training for veterans and military personnel, where everyone can not only improve their physical health but also make new friends and build a strong support community.
aboutUs.whatWeDoDescription2: We create a community of veterans and active military personnel, where everyone can share experiences, feel support, and gain strength for new achievements.
aboutUs.whatWeDoDescription3: We provide psychological support through group activities that help restore self-confidence, reduce stress, and overcome fears.
aboutUs.ourGoalDescription1: To expand our activities and help more people who need support in adapting to civilian life.
aboutUs.ourGoalDescription2: To engage more veterans and military personnel in active recovery not only of physical health but also of psychological well-being.
aboutUs.ourGoalDescription3: To go beyond training by creating diverse projects and programs to improve the quality of life for our participants.
aboutUs.whyItsImportantDescription1: Rehabilitation through sport: SUP training on the water is not just a physical challenge, but also a way to address emotional and psychological issues.
aboutUs.whyItsImportantDescription2: Community support: We have each other. Because, just like in life, it's important not to be alone.
aboutUs.whyItsImportantDescription3: A new beginning: We help our participants find a new path and feel like important members of society.
aboutUs.whyJoinUsDescription1: Free of charge: All you need is a desire to change your life for the better.
aboutUs.whyJoinUsDescription2: Outdoor activity: Water sports help relieve stress, improve physical health, and find inner peace.
aboutUs.whyJoinUsDescription3: Real support: Here, everyone finds understanding and support, feeling part of a large, friendly community.
aboutUs.finalTitle: We are Fortis Unitas. We are together. We are stronger.
